alert.note: Alert for Maricopa; Pinal (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 01 at 10:41PM MST until September 01 at 11:30PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: The National Weather Service in Phoenix has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Maricopa County in south central Arizona... Pinal County in southeastern Arizona... * Until 1130 PM MST. * At 1041 PM MST, a severe thunderstorm was located over Bapchule, or near Sun Lakes, moving southwest at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Chandler, Sun Lakes, Maricopa, Bapchule, Estrella Sailport, Olberg, Ak-Chin Village, Santan and Sacaton. This includes the following highways... AZ Interstate 10 between mile markers 165 and 179. AZ Route 87 between mile markers 151 and 162. AZ Route 238 between mile markers 37 and 44. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
